events.title: General Bug
events.description: The devs are busy fixing a major bug. They’re so deep into their code that they can’t even protect a player during this meeting.
events.fun_fact: Fun fact: According to you, in 2024, what percentage of developers are using artificial intelligence (like ChatGPT, Copilot, etc.) to help them write code, automate tasks, and boost their productivity?

events.title: Data Breach
events.description: The hackers decided to share some sensitive information—they sent an email to all the agency’s clients revealing that the manager had an inappropriate, non-consensual relationship with their intern. A role of their choice is now exposed to everyone.
events.fun_fact: Fun fact: What’s the most common cause of data breaches in companies?

events.title: Viral Advertising Campaign
events.description: The Influencer, a major competitor to Inoxtag, may not have climbed Mount Everest, but they temporarily gain the ability to impose two additional votes against a target.
events.fun_fact: Fun fact: What percentage of young consumers are more likely to buy a product recommended by an influencer?

events.title: Bad Buzz
events.description: The Influencer temporarily loses their power due to a scandal, like Norman fait des vidéos.
events.fun_fact: Fun fact: What percentage of total revenue from influencer marketing campaigns will micro-influencers generate by 2024?

events.title: Power Outage
events.description: A power outage prevents any communication between the players during the debriefing. And yes, the bills haven’t been paid, not great Thierry. The vote must be done in silence.
events.fun_fact: Fun fact: What was the average cost of power outages for a business in 2022?

events.title: Unexpected Client Pitch
events.description: The Manager can choose a player to give a 'pitch' for a client. The theme: 'Why striped socks are the future of the workplace.' This player is protected from elimination for one round, but watch out—they’ll need to convince with style!
events.fun_fact: Fun fact: What percentage of work meetings turn into discussions about cats, socks, or random group chats?

events.title: Viral Instagram Post
events.description: All players must vote anonymously (close your eyes and choose the player you want to eliminate). A player has accidentally revealed a group secret during an innocent conversation, and now everyone is too embarrassed to discuss openly. To avoid escalating the situation, they decide to hold an anonymous vote.
events.fun_fact: Fun fact: How many active users did Instagram have in 2023?

events.title: Performance Review
events.description: Each player must convince the audience that they’re not a hacker. One player accidentally sent a video of their pet playing with a USB cable instead of their report. The problem? Everyone thinks it was a coded message for a cyber attack.
events.fun_fact: Fun fact: What percentage of recruiters rely more on 'soft skills' than technical skills?

events.title: Corporate Hack
events.description: The Hackers steal a player's credentials and prevent them from using their power. One player accidentally shared their password with the whole team.
events.fun_fact: Fun fact: What percentage of cyberattacks in 2022 targeted small businesses?

events.title: Crisis Meeting
events.description: The server confused 'communication plan' with 'vacation plan.' As a result, all team messages are now invitations to a beach weekend with a DJ and barbecue. No voting this round. Instead, we chat freely.
events.fun_fact: Fun fact: What is the average cost of crisis meetings in companies per hour?

events.title: Publicity Stunt
events.description: The Manager organizes an advertising campaign. He selects a player who will be immune from elimination. The campaign was so successful that customers started believing the product could solve all their problems.
events.fun_fact: Fun fact: What is the increase in reach for digital ads when well-targeted?

events.title: Unexpected Deadline
events.description: The day's vote is sped up because the CEO is stressed after drinking way too much last night.
events.fun_fact: Fun fact: What percentage of workers admit to being more productive under pressure?

events.title: Coffee Break
events.description: The coffee break lasted way too long, and now it’s 6 PM. No voting or attacks take place. Players can chat freely.
events.fun_fact: Fun fact: How many hours per week does the average employee spend chatting at the coffee machine?

events.title: Manager's Delay
events.description: The manager forgets to use their double vote power. Indeed, the manager was a victim of a hostage situation in their office.
events.fun_fact: Fun fact: What percentage of managers admit to being late for their meetings?

events.title: Minor Bug
events.description: The Hackers lose their ability to attack for the night because they partied all night long.
events.fun_fact: Fun fact: What percentage of hackers admit they target systems 'for fun'?
